hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Farore's Wind#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Fish Bottle# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Din's Fire#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
